did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Delia Gottlieb Collection of Jacob Potofsky Memorabilia, 1956-1986
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Delia Gottlieb Collection of Jacob Potofsky Memorabilia #6286 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: New York Joint Board - Pendant
Jacob Potofsky - Passports and mini-portfolio
Jacob Potofsky - Travel paperwork and information
Jacob Potofsky Citizenship paperwork
Menu from LaGuardia Airport, NY (1940)
Certificate of Appreciation to Jacob Potofsky from City of New York
Registers from Jacob Potofsky's funeral
Business cards, misc., articles
Sidney Hillman picture ; 'Travel in Soviet Russia' - 1929
Sidney Hillman Sketches
Jacob Potofsky - Honorary Degree from Roosevelt Univ. ; Recognition of work for higher min. wage ; News clipping ; War Emergency Service Badge
Death Certificates for Simon Potofsky & Sara Potofsky - Correspondence - Certificate of Naturalization and Certificate of Citizenship for Jacob Potofsky
State of the Union Address by Lyndon Johnson (1964)
Buttons, Pins, Coins, etc. -- Metropolitan Florida ; AFL-CIO ; City of Rochester ; Dept. of Labor ; etc.
AFL-CiO, ACWA, ILGWU - Badges
Inaugural Committee, AFL-CIO, NRA - Badges, pins, tie tacks
Money clip, Pins, Badges, name plate, Pen - Jewish Labor Congress, Congressional Medal of Honor, AFL, ACWA, etc.
Gold and Bronze coins, Ash tray, Gold Key (Atlantic City)

scopecontent.p: President of the United States, Harry S. Truman ; American Jewish Tercentenary, 1654-1954 ; Si Vis Pacem Cole Iustitiam 1919-1969 (2) ; Princeton University Bicentennial 1746-1946 ; Cincuentenario 1903-1953 ; Philip Murray 1886-1952 ; Man's Opportunities and Responsibilities Under Freedom ; Coin of Beit-Shean - Items placed on acid free foam in bottom of box

did.unittitle: Coin and Pin - Israel Government Coins and Medals Corporation
Coins and Pendant - Unione Mondiale ORT, Congresso Perl ; For Distinguished Service to Higher Education, Brandeis University to Jacob S. Potofsky ; Greetings from Israel
Pieces of maroon colored cloth
Coin - Presented to Mr. Jacob Potofsky on the Opening of the New York Branch, Bank Hapoalim, B.M., November 25, 1974
Paper weight - Brandeis Centennial Year Sponsored by Brandeis University - Gold coin incased in plastic (Louis Dembitz Brandeis Centennial1956)
Plaque - Presented to Jacob S. Potofsky, A Founder of the United Jewish Appeal of Greater New York on the occasion of UJA's 25th Anniversary, 1939-1963 -- 25 Years of Rescue and Rebuilding
Mallet - New York City Central Labor Council Celebrating Jacob S. Potofsky - Week April 27 - May 2, 1964
Mallet -- Presented by Southern Regional Joint Board to Jacob S. Potofsky General President ACWA May 28th, 1972 , 28th Biennial Convention, Miami Beach, Florida
American Labor Party, Primary Election. 1944
American Labor party. Primary Election. 1946
Under Secretary of State. Luncheon Invitation
Israel Ambassador. Breakfast Invitation
CIO 14th Constitutional Convention Program
News clipping. Esther Peterson. NY Times December 8, 1986
Jacob Potofsky Passport
Silver Jubilee Convention - ACWA - Program
Wallet size photo of Jacob Potofsky
News clippings
News clippings
Sketch (pencil) of Jacob Potofsky ; 3-Cent Labor Day Commemorative U.S. Postage Stamp, issue 1956
